name: 1502 - XO - BP Perfecto
additionalNotes: The 1502 XO is Global Premium Cigar’s masterpiece cigar. Handmade at the Plasencia Cigars factory in Nicaragua, the 1502 XO is expertly crafted of undisclosed tobaccos that have been carefully age for 18 years. According to Enrique Sanchez, Global’s founder, “The 1502 XO achieves the perfect balance of flavor and strength.” A full-bodied stick, the 1502 XO has an overall sweetness highlighted with peppery notes. The 1502 XO is a limited-edition cigar. Only 1,502 boxes of 10 cigars were made, and each box comes with its own serial number.
